document_data.name: Linan Swift
document_data.mainbody: '''Linan Swift''' was a [[human]] female [[commoner]] in the small town of [[Greenest]], located in the [[Western Heartlands]] in [[west Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Personality: As a mother, Linan would fight to the death to save her children and her husband.
document_data.Possessions: To protect her children, Swift was known to fight with a round [[shield]] and a worn [[spear]].
document_data.History: Around [[1489 DR]]<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://community.wizards.com/comment/51033371#comment-51033371|title=Calendar Date in Realms|accessdate=2015-10-26|author=Skerrit}} during a battle with the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in the [[Tyranny of Dragons]], Linan, her husband [[Cuth Swift]], and their children were pursued by some [[kobold]]s until they were saved by some adventurers. After the fight, the commoners asked to be taken to the safety of the [[Keep (Greenest)|Keep]].
